item.description:
Join us for a beautiful Bike ride on a section of the Farmington Valley Rail Trail! We will start off in Unionville and head off towards Simsbury on the paved old rail beds! I will plan on riding about 10 miles but the trail goes much further for those interested! This is an easy ride with no hills and will be at a leisurely pace!
Lets meet up behind friendlys in the parking lot at the intersection of rts.4 and 177 in Unionville. Please be there by 10:45 as we will start out at 11:00 promptly.
Look for my white tracker with kayak racks! Any problems please call me at #860-309-3933.
Rain cancels this event.
